column5: I haven't posted in a while, life has kept me rather busy and away from fishing I am afraid, however this trip could not be missed.  What follows is a weekend to remember!  My father, brother and a friend always made a weekend trip to Temagami for a fall fish... Since Sonny's been gone, my dad and his buddy have been going! This year dads buddy couldn't make it... so dad decided to take his daughters instead.  Our Arrival ( Dad said, pack warm, it will be very cold, probably rain the whole time we are there!) 16 - 20 degree sunny weather the whole weekend!  Needless to say we overpacked!  15 minute boat ride from the launch to the island      Unpacked and got right out fishing!  Dad also said we shouldn't really expect to catch many fish ( they never really do well during the fall )... first night, a nice pike, a couple of bass and this great little guy, who I actually felt hit on my new carrot rod! Go figure!        We all love to sleep in so never got out for an early morning fish... Which is why I don't think we ever managed to catch a walleye. However, we did catch more bass, white fish, and lake trout.        It was an amazing weekend, seeing where our dad and brother would run away to several times a year and actually managing to outfish them once we finally got to go!  I guess the black and silver rapala J-11 wasn't the only lure to use up there...eh dad? lol  The weather managed to hold off until we had the boat loaded and we were heading home...      The whole trip home it poured rain and we talked about what a wonderful time we had and how lucky we were to not only have been blessed with good weather but the opportunity to spend time together. I should edit this a bit just to add the whitefish we caught trolling on mepps spinners, the lake trout jigging huge spoons while drifting over 80 to 150 ft drop offs and the bass on crappie rigs.  Unconventional fishing to say the least!
Excellent report Bet it was great to spend that time with your dad doing something you both enjoy
Great report Jen! Gave me a good smile. Well done on the whitefish and lake trout, they are not always easy to catch.  Its a good thing you didn't go this weekend... The weather has been terrible.
awesome trip jen with your family
jealous. you're making me jealous  your dad should make this kind of weekend an annual thing !
looks like 3bs at tamar in the first pic
Great report, fish and pics Jen Sounds like you all had a great time out there Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice to see ya posting again Jen.  Great weekend of weather and family time.  Thanks.  I've also enjoyed several visits, stays and memories at Tamar in that exact cabin. 3B.

Great report, Bernadette. Some excellent fish there too. All three of you must have been happy spending the weekend together like that. And, as corny as this may sound, I'm sure that Sonny had a hand in that trip and might even have helped with the catching part.  Thanks for sharing and please don't be a stranger.
Good to see you back on board Jen, it's been awhile.  Thanks for the fish'n tale, sounds like you guys had a great trip.
What a great report....beautiful place to be....don't know if your dad will invite you to [out]fish with him again though
Great report and pics Jen.  Looks like it was a fun time!
Great report! It was a pleasure to read!

You said you over packed no way, my wife tells me that everyone of those have dozen or so bags I put in the jeep every weekend are must haves!!!  Looks like you had a nice time with your pops those times are priceless!
Hey y y y  y, there's still time to do a carp fishing report if ya get right to it, eh? Nice to see ya back!
Great report!! I hope to take my girls out on fishing trips when they are all grown up too. Looks like the 3 of you had fun and it helps that the weather cooperated.

Not so corny Roy, I am sure he must have had a hand in the catching part... lake trout in the fall Jigging pfft... and white fish on spinners?? He was laughing his short little A** off the entire time from his little tiny fishing boat in the clouds!  It's great to be back on the water enjoying the moments that I love again!
Thanks for a view of the lake from a different perspective B ! Looked like a great time and nice weather..unlike the 10 days (9.5 rain) that Leah and I just endured !
